message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.DB. 

The paper proposes a machine learning model for the early detection of sepsis using electronic health records. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and specifically involves the use of deep learning (cs.NE) and attention mechanisms (cs.CL). The model also involves the use of Gaussian processes (cs.LG) for multitask learning (cs.LG) and interpretable predictions (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of data mining (cs.DB) techniques for sepsis detection. Finally, the paper also touches upon the importance of healthcare (cs.HC) costs and mortality rates associated with sepsis.
